author: Rebecca Shabad
title: Surgeon general says coronavirus death toll projections are 'sobering'
description: Surgeon General Jerome Adams said projections presented by the White House on Tuesday estimating hundreds of thousands of American deaths from the coronavirus are “sobering.”
content:
WASHINGTON Surgeon General Jerome Adams said Wednesday that projections presented by the White House a day earlier estimating that coronavirus could kill hundreds of thousands of Americans are sobering.
In an interview on NBCs TODAY show, host Savannah Guthr… [+2357 chars]
